isotib 0.1.2
  • Reference

Function reference

Our functions

The ones what we wrote

delete_x()
Delete on x
delete_y()
Delete on y
draw_column()
Draw a column
draw_row()
Draw a row
make_brick()
ISO coords
make_textvec()
Make a vector of text labels
make_wall()
Make the grid points for an inso 'wall'
paint_x()
Paint x vec
paint_y()
Paint y
paint_xy()
Paint xy
coords_heightmap()
Calculate isocubes coordinates from a height matrix
draw_z()
Draw on z
get_labels()
Get vector of labels
sdf_box()
Create 2x2x2 square centred at origin
sdf_cyl()
Create infinitely long cylinder at the origin aligned along z axis. r = 1
sdf_interpolate()
Linearly interpolate between two objects
sdf_intersect()
Intersection of multiple objects
sdf_intersect_smooth()
Intersection of multiple objects
sdf_onion()
Create a "thin" version of a given object.
sdf_plane()
Create semi-infinite volume encompassing all voxels with negative y values
sdf_render()
Render a set of objects within a voxel volume
sdf_repeat_infinite() sdf_repeat_finite()
Finite/Infinite repetition
sdf_rotatez() sdf_rotatey() sdf_rotatex()
Rotate a signed distance field around the z axis
sdf_round()
Create a rounded version of a given object.
sdf_scale()
Scale an object
sdf_sphere()
Create sphere centred at origin with r = 1
sdf_subtract()
Subtract on object from another
sdf_subtract_smooth()
Subtract on object from another
sdf_torus()
Create torus (donut) at origin
sdf_translate()
Translate an object
sdf_union()
Intersection of multiple objects
sdf_union_smooth()
Smoothed union of two objects

isocube functions

Doin the actual work

isocubesGrob()
Create a grob of isocubes

On this page
